body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<extension version="5.0" type="plugin" group="${1:group}" method="upgrade">
	<name>${2:Plugin Name}</name>
	<author>${3:Your Name}</author>
	<creationDate>${4:CURRENT_DATE}</creationDate>
	<copyright>(C) ${5:YEAR} ${3:Your Name}</copyright>
	<license>GNU General Public License version 2 or later; see LICENSE.txt</license>
	<authorEmail>${6:your.email@example.com}</authorEmail>
	<authorUrl>${7:www.example.com}</authorUrl>
	<version>1.0.0</version>
	<description>${8:PLUGIN_DESCRIPTION}</description>

	<files>
		<filename plugin="${9:plugin_name}">${9:plugin_name}.php</filename>
		<filename>services/provider.php</filename>
	</files>

	<config>
		<fields name="params">
			<fieldset name="basic">
				<field
					name="${10:param_name}"
					type="text"
					label="${11:PARAM_LABEL}"
					description="${12:PARAM_DESCRIPTION}"
				/>
			</fieldset>
		</fields>
	</config>
</extension>

<?php
use Joomla\DI\Container;
use Joomla\DI\ServiceProviderInterface;
use Joomla\CMS\Extension\ComponentInterface;

return new class implements ServiceProviderInterface
{
	/**
	 * Registers the service provider with a DI container.
	 *
	 * @param   Container  \$container  The DI container.
	 *
	 * @return  void
	 */
	public function register(Container \$container)
	{
		\$container->set(
			'${1:service_name}',
			function (Container \$container) {
				return new ${2:ServiceClass}(
					\$container->get('${3:dependency1}'),
					\$container->get('${4:dependency2}')
				);
			}
		);
	}
Joomla 5 Plugin Dependency Injection Pro.description: Joomla 5 Plugin Dependency Injection Service Provider

body:
<?php
use Joomla\CMS\Plugin\CMSPlugin;
use Joomla\Event\SubscriberInterface;
use Joomla\Event\DispatcherInterface;

class PlaceHolder${1:PluginName}Plugin extends CMSPlugin implements SubscriberInterface
{
	/**
	 * Returns an array of events this subscriber will listen to.
	 *
	 * @return array
	 */
	public static function getSubscribedEvents(): array
	{
		return [
			'${2:onEventName}' => 'on${3:EventMethod}',
		];
	}

	/**
	 * Event handler method
	 *
	 * @param   Event  ${4:$event}
	 * @return  void
	 */
	public function on${3:EventMethod}(${4:$event})
	{
		// Your event handling logic here
		${5:// Example: $event->getArgument('context');}
	}
Joomla 5 Basic Plugin Class.description: Joomla 5 Basic Plugin Class with Event Subscriber

body:
<?php
use Joomla\CMS\MVC\Controller\BaseController;
use Joomla\CMS\Factory;

class ${1:Component}Controller extends BaseController
{
	/**
	 * The default view for the component
	 *
	 * @var    string
	 */
	protected \$default_view = '${2:defaultview}';

	/**
	 * Method to display a view.
	 *
	 * @param   boolean  ${3:\$cachable}   If true, the view output will be cached
	 * @param   array    ${4:\$urlparams}  An array of safe URL parameters
	 *
	 * @return  BaseController  A BaseController object to support chaining
	 */
	public function display(${3:\$cachable} = false, ${4:\$urlparams} = [])
	{
		// Set the default view if not set
		${5:\$view} = Factory::getApplication()->getInput()->get('view', \$this->default_view);
		Factory::getApplication()->getInput()->set('view', ${5:\$view});

		// Call parent display method
		return parent::display(${3:\$cachable}, ${4:\$urlparams});
	}

	/**
	 * Custom method example
	 */
	public function ${6:customMethod}()
	{
		// Custom logic here
		${7:// Example: $event->getArgument('context');}
		\$this->setRedirect('index.php?option=${8:com_component}');
	}

<?php
use Joomla\CMS\MVC\Model\BaseDatabaseModel;
use Joomla\CMS\Factory;
use Joomla\Database\DatabaseInterface;

class ${1:Component}Model${2:ModelName} extends BaseDatabaseModel
{
	/**
	 * Database object
	 *
	 * @var    DatabaseInterface
	 */
	protected \$db;

	/**
	 * Constructor
	 *
	 * @param   array                \$config   An array of configuration options
	 * @param   DatabaseInterface    \$db       The database interface
	 */
	public function __construct(array \$config = [], DatabaseInterface \$db = null)
	{
		parent::__construct(\$config);
		\$this->db = \$db ?? Factory::getContainer()->get(DatabaseInterface::class);
	}

	/**
	 * Method to get data
	 *
	 * @return  array
	 */
	public function getData()
	{
		\$query = \$this->db->getQuery(true);
		\$query->select('*')
			->from(\$this->db->quoteName('${3:table_name}'));

		\$this->db->setQuery(\$query);
		return \$this->db->loadObjectList();
	}

	/**
	 * Method to save data
	 *
	 * @param   array  \$data  The data to save
	 *
	 * @return  bool
	 */
	public function save(array \$data)
	{
		try {
			// Perform validation
			\$this->validate(\$data);

			// Insert or update logic
			\$query = \$this->db->getQuery(true);
			\$columns = ['${4:column1}', '${5:column2}'];
			\$values = [
				\$this->db->quote(\$data['${4:column1}']),
				\$this->db->quote(\$data['${5:column2}'])
			];

			\$query->insert(\$this->db->quoteName('${3:table_name}'))
				->columns(\$this->db->quoteName(\$columns))
				->values(implode(',', \$values));

			\$this->db->setQuery(\$query);
			\$this->db->execute();

			return true;
		} catch (\Exception \$e) {
			\$this->setError(\$e->getMessage());
			return false;
		}
	}

	/**
	 * Validate input data
	 *
	 * @param   array  \$data  The data to validate
	 *
	 * @throws  \InvalidArgumentException
	 */
	protected function validate(array \$data)
	{
		// Add your validation logic
		if (empty(\$data['${4:column1}'])) {
			throw new \InvalidArgumentException('${6:Validation error message}');
		}
	}
Joomla 5 Component Model.description: Joomla 5 Component Base Model with CRUD Operations
